title: A Call to Rebuild the Temple
summary: Summary for Haggai 1. This chapter encourages the people to prioritize God's house and assures them of His presence and future glory.

faq.question: What does Haggai 1 urge God's people to do?
faq.answer: To rebuild the temple and refocus their priorities on God.

faq.question: What promise does God give in Haggai 1?
faq.answer: That His Spirit remains with them and the future glory will be greater than the former.
